name: Pipes
description: A random 3D pipe labyrinth generator. Constructed with watertight fitted mesh objects (cylinder pipes and elbow joints) with no exposed back faces. Pipes grow until a dead end, at which a new pipe of a different color begins to generate at a free point. Includes user interface for maze length, width, height, and tortuosity. Code available upon request.
learned: C++, G3D, mesh algorithms, 3D maze algorithms, design
